candidates.title: chore: cargo update cargo-zigbuild and cargo-xwin
chore: cargo update to remove rustix 0.35.x
Remove `human-panic` dependency
candidates.body: `human-panic` seems unmaintained and pulls in quite a lot of heavy dependencies for very limited value, we can explore lightweight alternative in the future.

candidates.title: refactor: Use `clap_complete_command`
candidates.body: https://github.com/nihaals/clap-complete-command

candidates.title: Bump MSRV to 1.62.0
candidates.body: Rust 1.62.0 is available on Debian testing, should also be available on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS soon.

candidates.title: Deprecate `python-source` option in Cargo.toml
candidates.body:
The sdist generation code assumes it's relative to `pyproject.toml`, to keep it simple, let's deprecate the option in Cargo.toml and only support it in `pyproject.toml`.

Fixes #1290

candidates.title: Fix generating pep517 sdist for src-layout
candidates.body: Fixes #1285

candidates.title: Downgrade cargo_metadata to 0.15.0
candidates.body: See https://github.com/oli-obk/cargo_metadata/issues/212

candidates.title: Add support for `uniffi` bindings
candidates.body: https://github.com/mozilla/uniffi-rs

candidates.title: Release v0.14.0
candidates.body: Will wait for a couple of days before merging.

candidates.title: Add support for `PYO3_ENVIRONMENT_SIGNATURE`
candidates.body: xref https://github.com/PyO3/pyo3/pull/2727

candidates.title: Convert workspace.dependency entries to tables if necessary
candidates.body:
When a `worksapce.dependency` is written in its short form,
e.g. `rand = "0.8"`, we need to convert that to a table before
combining it with `optional` or `features` entries from the
crate dependencies.

candidates.title: Lookup inherited build- and dev-dependencies in dependencies
candidates.body:
Following the docs in https://doc.rust-lang.org/stable/cargo/reference/workspaces.html#the-workspacedependencies-table
and https://doc.rust-lang.org/stable/cargo/reference/specifying-dependencies.html#inheriting-a-dependency-from-a-workspace
which says

    Dependencies in the [dependencies], [dev-dependencies], [build-dependencies], and [target."...".dependencies] sections support the ability to reference the [workspace.dependencies] definition of dependencies.

So, we should not lookup build- and dev-dependencies in their workspace.* equivalent but only in workspace.dependencies

candidates.title: Update cargo-xwin to 0.12.1
candidates.body: ~~Finally we get rid of clap 3 in `Cargo.lock`.~~ Upgrade `indicatif` to 0.17.2.

candidates.title: Add `[tool.maturin.include]` and `[tool.maturin.exclude]`
candidates.body:
Based on the discussion in #1253, this is another attempt to allow users to override ignore files in Python modules by adding `[tool.maturin.include]` and `[tool.maturin.exclude]` similar to [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/docs/pyproject/#include-and-exclude). This deprecates `[tool.maturin.sdist-include]`.

After some feedback on this approach, I'll add:
- [x] Documentation updates
- [x] Integration tests

Closes #1253

candidates.title: Add support for 32-bit x86 FreeBSD target
chore: update windows-sys to 0.42.0
candidates.body: Although `windows-sys` 0.36 is still pulled in by the `schannel` dep of `native-tls`, we use `rustls` by default on Windows so it's fine to leave it in lock file.

candidates.title: Upgrade to Rust 2021 edition
candidates.body: 2021 edition was released in [Rust 1.56.0](https://blog.rust-lang.org/2021/10/21/Rust-1.56.0.html), now that our MSRV is 1.61.0 we can use it.

candidates.title: Refactor building non abi3 wheels when pyo3 abi3 feature is enabled
candidates.body: Helps https://github.com/PyO3/maturin/pull/1232#issuecomment-1298743666

candidates.title: Remove `workspace.members` in `Cargo.toml` from sdist if there isn't any path dependency
candidates.body: Fixes #1226

labels.name: CI-no-fail-fast
labels.description: If one job fails, allow the rest to keep testing

candidates.title: Remove usage of deprecated clap options

candidates.title: Add snapshot testing for maturin cli
candidates.body:
https://docs.rs/trycmd/latest/trycmd/

Prepare for clap 4.0 upgrade, this will allow us to see what have changed in the cli.

repo.name: maturin
repo.description: Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as well as rust binaries as python packages
